text: It was hard not to gush about the royal wedding, which enthralled millions of people around the world on Saturday. But, gush is precisely what one person in attendance has done following the big day. Suits creator Aaron Korsh tweeted about his experience of attending what he described as a ` ` seemingly world - changing event.''
